title: CBC Radio
text:
Jonathan Van Ness is the poster boy for positivity on the hit Netflix show Queer Eye. The fun, high-energy grooming expert has helped countless people practice self-acceptance.

He's at the peak of his fame right now, but in his new memoir, Over the Top: A Raw Journey to Self-Love, he shares a lot of things that fans don't know about him — the big one in the news this week is that he's living with HIV.

Van Ness joined q's Tom Power to share more of his story with us. His memoir Over the Top: A Raw Journey to Self-Love is out now.

Download our podcast or click 'Listen' above to hear the full conversation with Jonathan Van Ness.

— Produced by ​Vanessa Greco
description: Queer Eye's Jonathan Van Ness joined q's Tom Power to share a few stories from his new memoir, Over the Top: A Raw Journey to Self-Love.
